name: untuck
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to move something such as a piece of clothing or cloth out of a position where it is folded or kept in place: Untucking his neatly ironed shirt, he showed them the scar on his chest. She untucked her sleeves and pulled them down so that they hung over her wrists. He wriggled out from under the covers without untucking them. Related words
